name: WP WooCommerce Product slider
author: Xgenious

sections.description:
Display WP WooCommerce Product slider anywhere in your wordpress site using WP WooCommerce Product Slider plugin shortcodes. It has build in support of product quick view and also wishlist system. it has build in support for popuplar page builder like Elementor and Wpbakery Page Builder.

CHECK WP WooCommerce Product Slider[FREE] DEMOS
WooCommerce Product Slider Demo

WP WooCommerce Product Slier Pro Plugin[PAID]
Pro Version Demo (it give a pro version of plugin file.)

AWESOME FEATURES

  • Add WooCommerce Product slider using shortcode as your requirements
  • 02 unique design
  • Unlimited color options
  • Easy to customize with plugin Options
  • fully responsive
  • Cross browser support

WP WooCommerce Product Slier Pro [PAID] Features

  • 15 unique slider (more coming soon)
  • Category wise product slider
  • Build in Quick view Support
  • Build In wishlist support
  • Responsive Design
  • You can customize almost everything
  • Have slider setting to customize slide as you want
  • Have Typography setting to customize typography according to your need
  • Have styling options so you can adjust slider color with your theme color
  • Build in Support for WpBakery Page builder (have addon for wpbakery page builder)
  • Build In Support for Elementor page builder (have elementor widget )
  • Have options to manage quick list modal and also have options to customize quick view modal according to your need
  • Have options to manage wishlilst page and also have options to customize wishlist page according to your need
  • Have quick setup video tutorial with plugin
  • All Browser Supported
  • Compatible latest version WordPress
  • Cross browser support
  • Clean Coding, W3c Validate
  • 24/7 First Support
  • Step by Step Well Documented
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/wp-woocommerce-product-slider directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

  3. Go to WP WooCommerce Slider option and here you see options change the setting as per your need. or leave this and just copy thes shortcode given here it will take default settings.

  4. To embed the WP WooCommerce Slider in a page or post, use the default shortcode: [xgpp__slider ]

  5. ONLINE DOCUMENTATION :- Click Here

short_description: WP WooCommerce Product Slider is a collection of WooCommerce Product Slider with 3 unique style. it help you to create beautifully slider layout in couple of minutes. In Slider you have Quick view options , Wishlist options and also compare options. It super easy to use.
